bug.author: JimmyWhitaker
bug.summary: Line numbers from generated code differ from written code
bug.description: The line numbers from the generated code in execution (thrown from errors) do now correlate to the written code in the Operation View.

comments.comment: After we have <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deepforge-dev/deepforge/issues/364>#364</denchmark-link> , we can address this in the job editor
